title:
Convergence Speed for Fekete Points on Uniformly Polynomially Cuspidal
  Sets
authors: Hyunsoo Ahn and Ngoc Cuong Nguyen
abstract:
We obtain the convergence speed for Fekete points on uniformly polynomially
cuspidal compact sets introduced by Pawlucki and Ple\'sniak. This is done by
showing that these sets are $(\mathscr{C}^{\alpha},
\mathscr{C}^{\alpha'})$-regular in the sense of Dinh, Ma and Nguyen.
